• Home

For this week's assignment I used a dataset containing the nutritional information of different cereal. Originally there were roughly 80 different breands listed so to make data more manageable, I chose the most popular brands. This brought me to about 20 different items. I then created an object call cereal and added each one into an array inside the object. Each array contains the cereal name, number of calories, grams of sugar,total number of vitamins, whether the cereal is eaten hot or cold and finally an overall health rating based on a scale of 1 to 100.

currently, you are able to search for the cereal name in a search bar on the page. If part of or the entire name matches with a cereal name from the object it will display all the info of that cereal in the console. If there are multiple cereals that match the entry, all of them will be brought up in the console. Unfortunately, I was unable to bring up the data on the page itself because the data comes up as undefined when I do.
